backendOptimization.title: Recommendation for Backend Calls
backendOptimization.description: I recommend optimizing backend calls by implementing caching on the frontend (for example, using React Query) to avoid unnecessary requests and improve user experience speed. I also suggest using pagination or lazy loading for endpoints that return large lists, and canceling or preventing duplicate requests when the user navigates quickly or switches views. This reduces resource consumption and improves the overall efficiency of the application.

paragraph_1.title: Performance:
paragraph_1.description: Only renders visible elements, significantly improving performance

paragraph_2.title: Memory:
paragraph_2.description: Reduces memory usage by not keeping all elements in the DOM

paragraph_3.title: Scalability:
paragraph_3.description: Allows handling thousands of items without performance issues

paragraph_4.title: UX:
paragraph_4.description: Keeps the user experience smooth even with large amounts of data
